title: Optimized irrigation practices with fertilizer utilization strategies to improve photo-fluorescence efficiency, vascular bundles and maize production in semi-arid regions
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Xiaoxia Liu, Shahzad Ali, Liyu Yang, Tao He, Gang Pang, Mohammed Rafi Shaik, Mohamed E. Assal, Shaik Althaf Hussain, Mudassar Nawaz Khan
